Position: General Manager – Aftersales
Supply aftersales, sales and marketing support to Nissan and Infiniti dealers throughout United Arab Emirates, Saudi Arabia, Kuwait, and Bahrain and similar support to Nissan, Kia, and Mercedes dealers throughout the USA – State of California. Proven experience of managing a large service operation with multiple locations and a big team of Technicians and managers.
Successfully managed the aftersales profit and loss (P+L), increasing sales revenue by 11% and net operating profit by 20%, maximized cost efficiency and productivity.
Responsible for departmental Profit Centre, Balance sheet and Head count. Managing the process of recruitment for enhancing profit and reducing expenses, acting as an In-charge of after-sales business across Saudi Arabia, Kuwait, and Bahrain.
Initiated and implemented new aftersales programs for Service, Body shop, Parts, DND (Dealer Network Development), Customer Relation Management program and Intellectual Property Rights activities establishing objectives & goals comprising business plans, which sequentially increased profitability, loyalty, and customer retention.

Creating and implementing after-sales policies and procedures adhering to (SLA’s) Service Level Agreements.
Re-designed existing procedures to Standard Operating Procedures in line with company norms and policies with HR, IT and Finance to sustain healthy working ethics.
Conducting timely meetings with business partners (Insurance companies, Fleet customers, Governmental bodies) to discuss the business review performance, setting counter measures and implementing Plan Do Check and Action (PDCA), ensuring sustainable profitability.
Strategically planned and implemented seasonal marketing campaigns / activities coherent in direction ensuring high level of customer satisfaction and business growth.

Generating new leads of customers through internal relationship ensuring growing profitability, executing plans to reach out unexplored market segments & customer groups for business expansion.
Analyzing client’s requirements about project and providing optimal solution in terms of product selection. Planned upgradation / expansion of service infrastructure in line with DND & PMA.

Customer centric mindset, Managed logistics, Supply Chain Management, Technical matters and Warranty issues goodwill issues, ensuring high TCS - Total Customer Satisfaction.
